meanings.definition: Engaged in the activity of discussing or thinking deeply about philosophical topics.
meanings.sent1: The philosophized students debated the meaning of life in class.
meanings.sent2: Her philosophized essay on ethics impressed the professor.
meanings.sent3: The philosophized group of friends pondered the nature of existence over coffee.
meanings.sent4: His philosophized approach to problem-solving was both insightful and innovative.
meanings.sent5: The philosophized discussion left a lasting impact on their perspectives.

meanings.definition: Presented or explained in a philosophical manner.
meanings.sent1: The philosophized speech by the philosopher captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a philosophized article on the concept of time.
meanings.sent3: The philosophized movie made viewers reflect on deep questions about humanity.
meanings.sent4: His philosophized interpretation of the painting added depth to its meaning.
meanings.sent5: The philosophized novel challenged readers to think beyond the surface.
